title: How to Prepare Organic Pesticides   Year 2022

tasks.task: Create an organic pesticide using various ingredients
subtasks: Gather materials (aloe vera, red pepper, marigold, tomato leaves, onions, etc.)
Pound ingredients with a mortar and pestle or knife
Let the mixture sit for 3 days to allow decoction
Strain the mixture to remove solids
Apply the pesticide solution to crops as needed

tasks.task: Discuss the benefits of using organic pesticides
subtasks: Mentioning natural pest control (aphids, caterpillars, ants, beetles)
Discussing the use of flowers for aesthetics and attracting beneficial insects
Highlighting the zero chemical residual of the mixture

tasks.task: Create an organic pesticide using aloe vera, red pepper, marigold, tomato leaves, and onions.
Create an organic pesticide solution using natural ingredients
subtasks: Gather aloe vera, red pepper, marigold, tomato leaves, and onions
Pound the chopped materials with a mortar and pestle
Combine the pounded materials with water in a container and let steep
Strain the mixture to obtain the pesticide solution
